lang.motopressDescription: MotoPress graditelj sadržaja čini proces izgradnje lakim i brzim. Njegova Drag & Drop funkcionalnost pomaže vam upravljati vašim stranicama, dodavati ugrađene elemente sadržaja, urediti ih vizualno i vidjeti rezultat odmah. Za više informacija posjetite getmotopress.com
lang.jQueryVerNotSupported: Minimalna jQuery verzija -% minjQueryVer%. Minimalna jQuery UI verzija -% minjQueryUIVer%. Molimo ažurirajte WordPress na 3.5 ili noviju verziju.
lang.MBStringNotEnabled: MotoPress error: contact your hosting provider to enable mbstring extension.
lang.browserNotSupported: Vaš preglednik nije podržan. Preporučujemo jedan od podržanih preglednika: Firefox, Chrome.
lang.permissionDenied: Možda niste prijavljeni ili nemate dozvolu
lang.blocksOverflow: Dosegli ste maksimalan broj blokova dostupnih za ovaj red
lang.CEDescription: Dugme za editiranje sadržaja može se pronaći na stranicama i postovima.
lang.CEOptRolesSettings: Onemogući Editor Sadržaja za grupe korisnika:
lang.CEOptRolesSettingsDescription: Sakrij MotoPress izbornik i dugmad za izabrane grupe.
lang.CEOptLanguageSettingsDescription: Translate MotoPress plugin to your native language
lang.CETextareaCustomCSSDescription: Unesite svoj CSS kod u ovo polje kako bi dodali nove stilove u temu.
lang.CEOptSpellcheckDescription: Za provjeru pravopisa svog unosa, provjera pravopisa mora biti omogućena u vašem pregledniku.
lang.CEOptMsgNotWritable: Napomena: ne možete uređivati ​​prilagođeni CSS kod jer direktorij %dir% nije pronađen ili nije za pisanje.
lang.CENoticeDefaultGoogleFontError: Error while installing the default set of Google Fonts.
lang.CEOptMsgGoogleFontNotWritable: Note: you are not able to edit Google Fonts because the directory %dir% not found or not writable.
lang.CEOptAutoSave: Spremi podatke članka prije pokretanja Editora. Poboljšava kompatibilnost s temama i pluginovima.
lang.CEOptExcerptShortcode: Pretvori shortcodove u sažetku u html
lang.CEOptSaveExcerpt: Automatski ažurira Sažetak i tag Još, nakon zatvaranja editora
lang.CEOptGoogleFontsDesc: Use this form to add Google Fonts to MotoPress. You can find these fonts at the Style panel of the text objects. Press Save button at the bottom of the page to apply your changes.
lang.CEOptGoogleFontsTip: Tip: Using many font styles and character sets can slow down your webpage, so only select the ones you actually need on your webpage.
lang.CEOptGoogleFontsCustomClassNameDesc: Enter Custom Style Name ex. HomePageHeader to use in Style selector and press Add Google Font button. Choose Font Family and styles of the created font style.
lang.CEOptGoogleFontsWrongClassName: Custom Style Name can contain only latin letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.
lang.CEOptGoogleFontsDuplicateClassName: This Custom Style Name already exists.
lang.CEDomainMapping: Koristite mapirane domene za pristup admin području. Saznajte < href='https://motopress.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/200884839-WordPress-Multisite-domain-mapping-configuration' target = "_blank"> ovdje kako namjestiti ga
lang.CELicenseNotice: Vaša licenca nije aktivirana. Molimo, aktivirajte svoju licencu da možete ažurirati plugin
lang.CELicenseHelp: Stvaranje nove šifre licence za besplatno primati ažuriranja i podršku
lang.CELicenseItemNameNotice: Vaš šifra licence ne odgovara instaliranom plaginuKako ovo ispraviti.
lang.CEErrorTitle: Došlo je do interne pogreške prilikom učitavanja editora sadržaja. Molimo dostaviti ove podatke timu za podršku.
lang.CEEmptySceneHelperContent: Povlačite objekte s lijevog panela na ovo područje da možete početi raditi s njima
lang.CEEmptySceneHelperInputText: Kliknite ovdje da možete početi tipkati
lang.CEDefaultWPEditor: Spremate se urediti sadržaj stvoren s WordPress Editor-om. Dostupan je kao jedan blok, i može se uređivati pomoću WordPress Editor-a
lang.CEStyleClassesLabelDesc: Customize this element by selecting available styles. Hover the Eye icon to preview style.
lang.CERowStyleClassesLabelAddtlDesc: Note: some styles like 'Full-Width' of the row work at Site only.
lang.CEGoogleFontsStyleClassesLabelAddtlDesc: Note: go to Dashboard - MotoPress Options to add Google Fonts.
lang.CEStyleClassesFormatNoMatches: Nema Stilovi za ovaj elementa. Za prijavu vrste stila klase formirajte stile stranicu i upišite ga i pritisnite Unesi.
lang.CERowObjTypeBGDesc: Cijeli pregled je dostupan na samo web stranicI. Odaberite 'Puna širina' stila da se raširi medij na cijelu širinu stranice.
lang.CERowObjBGVideoWEBMLegend: Odaberite video iz Media Library u webm, mp4 i ogg formatu za kompatibilnost pri prekrižavanju-preglednika. Koristite video konverter da pretvoriti tvoj video
lang.CERowObjBGYoutubeDesc: Zalijepite URL YouTube video koji želite postaviti
lang.CERowObjParallaxImageDesc: Pozadinska slika kreće se sporije nego sadržaja u prvom planu
lang.CETextObjButtonDesc: Kliknite na okvir za dodavanje tekst i uredite sadržaja ili kliknite Uredi
lang.CEMembersObjMessageLabel: Message for not logged in users
lang.CEMembersObjMessageDefault: Ovaj sadržaj je samo za registrirane korisnike. Molim% prijavu%.
lang.CEMembersObjMessageDesc: This message will see not logged in users
lang.CEMembersObjContentValue: Only registered users will see this content.
lang.CEGoogleChartsObjTypeDesc: Find out more about chart types at Google Charts
lang.CEGoogleChartsObjDataDesc: Data in each row separated by comma
lang.CEGoogleChartsObjColorsDesc: Comma separated HEX color values. Ex: #e0440e, #e6693e
lang.CEImageObjSrcDesc: Choose an image from Media Library
lang.CEImageObjLinkDesc: Click on image to open the link. (ex. http://yoursite.com/)
lang.CEImageRelLabel: Link 'rel' value for your custom lightbox
lang.CEImageCustomSizeLabel: Enter image size in pixels, ex. 200x100 (Width x Height)
lang.CEImageIdEmpty: Image source is empty. Please select image.
lang.CEAttachmentEmpty: Empty attachment or post type not equal 'attachment'
lang.CEImageSliderObjAnimationDesc: Preview the page to view the animation
lang.CEImageSliderObjSmoothHeightDesc: Animate the height of the slider smoothly for slides of varying height
lang.CEImageSliderObjAutoplayDesc: The slideshow will start automatically when the page is loaded
lang.CEVideoObjSrcDesc: Paste the URL of a video (Vimeo or YouTube) you'd like to embed
lang.CEParseVideoURLError: Error while parsing the video URL
lang.CEVideoIdError: Error while getting the video id
lang.CEValues: Value should be one of these values: %values%
lang.CEIdValidation: Value should not be longer than 50 characters and consist of letters from a-z (LowerCase, UpperCase), characters: _ - .
lang.CENameValidation: Value should not be longer than 100 characters and not contain characters: \ "
lang.CEIconValidation: Invalid MIME type %name%. Allowed MIME types: image/jpeg, image/png
lang.CETitleValidation: Value should not be longer than 300 characters and not contain characters: \ "
lang.CECreateTemporaryPostError: An error occurred while creating temporary post
lang.CERemoveTemporaryPostError: An error occurred while removing temporary post
lang.CEAttachmentThumbnailError: Error while getting the attachment thumbnail
lang.CEAttachmentImageSrc: Error getting the attachment image src
lang.CEwpArchivesDescription: A monthly archive of your site posts
lang.CEwpCalendarDescription: A calendar of your site posts
lang.CEwpCategoriesDescription: A list or dropdown of categories
lang.CEwpCustomMenuDescription: Use this widget to add one of your custom menus as a widget.
lang.CEwpMetaDescription: Log in/out, admin, feed and WordPress links
lang.CEwpRecentPostsDescription: The most recent posts on your site
lang.CEwpRSSUrlDescription: Enter the RSS feed URL here
lang.CEwpRSSQuantityDescription: How many items would you like to display?
lang.CEwpRSSSearchDescription: A search form for your site
lang.CEwpTagCloudDescription: Your most used tags in cloud format
lang.CEwpAudioSourceDesc: If your current browser does not support HTML5 audio or Flash Player is not installed, a direct download link will be displayed instead of the player
lang.CEwpAudioIdDescription: Select audio file from Media Library
lang.CEwpAudioAutoplayDesc: Play file automatically when page is loaded
lang.CEwpWidgetsAreaDescription: Use this widget to add one of your Widget Areas.
lang.CEGoogleMapObjAddressDesc: To find a specific address or location, just enter what you're looking for and press Enter
lang.CEGoogleMapNothingFound: Nothing found. Please enter correct address.
lang.CEObjTableDataDesc: Data in each row separated by comma. Find out more about CSV format.
lang.CEEmbedObjPasteCodeDescription: Note: Most <script> embeds will only appear on the published site. We recommend using <iframe> based embed code
lang.CEEmbedObjFillDescription: Expand object to fill available width and height
lang.CETabsObjPaddingLabel: Prostor između granica i tab sadržaja
lang.CEContentDefault: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam eu hendrerit nunc. Proin tempus pulvinar augue, quis ultrices urna consectetur non.
lang.CEActiveDesc: Only one %name% can be active at a time
lang.CEUpgradeText: This feature is only available in Pro Version
lang.CELiteTooltipText: This feature is only available in Pro version
lang.CEMoreHandlerTitle: Use this pointer to set an Excerpt and More tag of this post. Drag and drop it to the one of the predefined positions. Move pointer to the most top position to disable it
lang.CENeedHeadwayThemeGrid: Nema bloka za sadržaja na ovoj stranici predloška. Dodaj bloka za sadržaj prvo pomoću Headway Grid.
lang.CENeedContentOutput: Nema dijela za sadržaj na predlošku ove stranice. Provejrite je li predložak stranica ispravan.
lang.CEPostsGridObjPostTypeDesc: Select post type to populate posts from
lang.CEPostsGridObjCategoryDesc: Separate with ',' to display posts that have either of these categories or with '+' to display posts that have all of these categories.
lang.CEPostsGridObjTagDesc: Separate with ',' to display posts that have either of these tags or with '+' to display posts that have all of these tags.
lang.CEChooseLayout: or choose one of the predefined layouts
lang.CEImagesNotSet: List of images is empty. Select images.
